description: Access Control implemented via unique user identifiers
User Identification implemented via login credentials
Emergency Access Procedures implemented via system override procedures
Encryption and Decryption implemented via cryptographic algorithms
Audit Controls implemented via logging systems
Integrity Controls implemented via checksums and hashing
Cryptographic Key Management implemented via key storage systems
Transmission Security implemented via encrypted channels
Automatic Logoff implemented via timeout mechanisms
Access Management System implemented via role-based access
Network Security implemented via firewalls and IDS
